title: Homura Fan Gathering
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>T-.... this is….!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Do you understand now…. Hanamaru….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru understands zura! The red bean paste is different from the manjuus that Honoka-san brought before!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>At homura, while honoring tradition, they also pay attention to where the red beans are grown and things like the temperature and humidity of the day when they’re making the paste<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>*Munch munch*.... *Munch munch*....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Did you hear what I said?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>About half of it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Well, I guess it can’t be helped. Homura manjuu is really that delicious…. *Munch*....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Umi-san, Maru wants to eat 3 more of these zura….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Fufu, do eat a lot. It seems that next month will have a different red bean paste, I’ll bring them to you again then, Hanamaru-san. Let’s deepen our relationship as fellow japanese sweets lovers!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
